title: What the heck????
body:
Why is this happening to me? I have a verry strong computer im playing this game for 1 year and i had it on a 512 mb  intel video card 2 gb ram and 1.40 ghz processor dual core 
what the heck is wrong with this pc??

My new pc:

4 gb ram
64-bit
Pentium (R) Dual-Core cpu e5300 2.60 ghz

Graphics:
Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT 2 gb

My cousin played World of tanks on med settings and it worked well - 40/50 fps
Now i can't even launch WoT download , and what i mean is i cant start the client download
Same thing with league of legends
Can you guys fix this please????

{{summoner:14}} {{summoner:4}}  {{champion:266}}

replies.body: I check back and see the the same exact thing is still occurring. Players are still, myself included, having issues with this. And, it is still the same run of the mill bs being force fed to the community. You are at fault. Your pc. Your connection. You. You. And only you. It is abundantly clear that you guys have no desire to keep any of your players. So long as there is still a decent base of players to buy into things and throw money at the game, it ultimately is a small problem to deal with by RIOT and those under RIOT's employment.  Ridiculous, guys and gals. Fooooking Ridiculous.

Hey, welcome back, Greenlightgo22 :)

Riot broke "World of Tanks" now?
It looks like your client found some bad files and trying to fix them, so it may not be exclusive to your PC hardware.  What issue are you experiencing exactly?

Hi Farokgyik, 

It looks like the repair tool is already running on your computer, I would wait for that to finish before trying anything else.

If the issue is affecting games other than League, then the issue is likely specific to your computer, and beyond the scope of the League boards to resolve.

As a rule, you should always make sure that you have the latest drivers and operating system patches if you are having system-wide issues.
I have the latest drivers , no viruses everything is ok , ill leave it and let you know when it finishes , thanks for replying <3
